header.title: Terms of Service
header.subtitle: These terms govern your use of Multiversity in accordance with South Korean law.

sections.title: 1. Eligibility & Account
sections.content: Users must be 14 or older, reflecting the Youth Protection Act. Creating an account indicates acceptance of these terms and acknowledgement that your data may be processed domestically.

sections.title: 2. Acceptable Use
sections.content: You agree not to upload unlawful material or content violating the National Security Law or the Act on Promotion of Information and Communications Network Utilization. Educational use is encouraged, but commercial redistribution requires a written license.

sections.title: 3. Paid Services & Refunds
sections.content: Subscription fees follow the Electronic Commerce Act; customers may cancel within seven days unless significant value has already been delivered (e.g., download of exclusive datasets). Refunds are processed in KRW.

sections.title: 4. Governing Law
sections.content: These terms are governed by the laws of the Republic of Korea. Disputes shall be submitted to the Seoul Central District Court.
